message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LO, cs.DB, cs.PL, cs.CC

The paper deals with a language for specifying problems in NP, which is closely related to ASP (Answer Set Programming). Therefore, cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LO (Logic in Computer Science) are likely categories. The paper also mentions Datalog and circumscription, which are related to databases and knowledge representation, respectively, suggesting cs.DB (Databases) as another possible category. The translations from NP-SPEC into ASP involve logic programming, which is related to cs.PL (Programming Languages). Finally, the paper discusses the possibility of incorporating certain language constructs of NP-SPEC into mainstream ASP, which could be relevant to cs.CC (Computational Complexity).
